Package br.com.rpgcampaign.cliproject.character

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.rpgcampaign.cliproject.character.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NonPlayableCharacter, PlayableCharacter
    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    The Abstract Class Character represents a character. The character contains a name, a level and hit points and might be of two types: Playable Character or Non Playable Character. The Playable character is the one owned by a Player. The Non Playable Character is owned by a campaign and differently of the Playable one, it didn't have experience points.
    Since:
    02/10/2019
    Version:
    3
    Author:
    jonas

        public abstract java.lang.StringBuilder printSpreadsheat()
